verses.text: Now these \add are\add* the \w priests|strong="H3548"\w* and the \w Levites|strong="H3881"\w* that went \w up|strong="H5927"\w* with \w Zerubbabel|strong="H2216"\w* the \w son|strong="H1121"\w* of \w Shealtiel|strong="H7597"\w*, and \w Jeshua|strong="H3442"\w*: \w Seraiah|strong="H8304"\w*, \w Jeremiah|strong="H3414"\w*, \w Ezra|strong="H5830"\w*,
\w Amariah|strong="H0568"\w*, \w Malluch|strong="H4409"\w*, \w Hattush|strong="H2407"\w*,\f + \fr 12.2 \ft Malluch: also called, Melicu\f*

\w Shechaniah|strong="H7935"\w*, \w Rehum|strong="H7348"\w*, \w Meremoth|strong="H4822"\w*,\f + \fr 12.3 \ft Shechaniah: also called, Shebaniah\f*\f + \fr 12.3 \ft Rehum: also called, Harim\f*\f + \fr 12.3 \ft Meremoth: also called, Meraioth\f*
\w Iddo|strong="H5714"\w*, \w Ginnetho|strong="H1599"\w*, \w Abijah|strong="H0029"\w*,\f + \fr 12.4 \ft Ginnetho: also called, Ginnethon\f*
\w Miamin|strong="H4326"\w*, \w Maadiah|strong="H4573"\w*, \w Bilgah|strong="H1083"\w*,\f + \fr 12.5 \ft Miamin: also called, Miniamin\f*\f + \fr 12.5 \ft Maadiah: also called, Moadiah\f*
\w Shemaiah|strong="H8098"\w*, and \w Joiarib|strong="H3114"\w*, \w Jedaiah|strong="H3048"\w*,

\w Sallu|strong="H5543"\w*, \w Amok|strong="H5987"\w*, \w Hilkiah|strong="H2518"\w*, \w Jedaiah|strong="H3048"\w*. These \add were\add* the \w chief|strong="H7218"\w* of the \w priests|strong="H3548"\w* and of their \w brethren|strong="H0251"\w* in the \w days|strong="H3117"\w* of \w Jeshua|strong="H3442"\w*.\f + \fr 12.7 \ft Sallu: also called, Sallai\f*

Moreover the \w Levites|strong="H3881"\w*: \w Jeshua|strong="H3442"\w*, \w Binnui|strong="H1131"\w*, \w Kadmiel|strong="H6934"\w*, \w Sherebiah|strong="H8274"\w*, \w Judah|strong="H3063"\w*, \add and\add* \w Mattaniah|strong="H4983"\w*, \add which was\add* over the \w thanksgiving|strong="H1960"\w*, he and his \w brethren|strong="H0251"\w*.\f + \fr 12.8 \ft the thanksgiving: that is, the psalms of thanksgiving\f*
Also \w Bakbukiah|strong="H1229"\w* and \w Unni|strong="H6042"\w*, their \w brethren|strong="H0251"\w*, \add were\add* over against them in the \w watches|strong="H4931"\w*.

¶ And \w Jeshua|strong="H3442"\w* \w begat|strong="H3205"\w* \w Joiakim|strong="H3113"\w*, \w Joiakim|strong="H3113"\w* also \w begat|strong="H3205"\w* \w Eliashib|strong="H0475"\w*, and \w Eliashib|strong="H0475"\w* \w begat|strong="H3205"\w* \w Joiada|strong="H3111"\w*,
And \w Joiada|strong="H3111"\w* \w begat|strong="H3205"\w* \w Jonathan|strong="H3129"\w*, and \w Jonathan|strong="H3129"\w* \w begat|strong="H3205"\w* \w Jaddua|strong="H3037"\w*.

And in the \w days|strong="H3117"\w* of \w Joiakim|strong="H3113"\w* were \w priests|strong="H3548"\w*, the \w chief|strong="H7218"\w* of the \w fathers|strong="H0001"\w*: of \w Seraiah|strong="H8304"\w*, \w Meraiah|strong="H4811"\w*; of \w Jeremiah|strong="H3414"\w*, \w Hananiah|strong="H2608"\w*;
Of \w Ezra|strong="H5830"\w*, \w Meshullam|strong="H4918"\w*; of \w Amariah|strong="H0568"\w*, \w Jehohanan|strong="H3076"\w*;
Of \w Melicu|strong="H4409"\w*, \w Jonathan|strong="H3129"\w*; of \w Shebaniah|strong="H7645"\w*, \w Joseph|strong="H3130"\w*;
Of \w Harim|strong="H2766"\w*, \w Adna|strong="H5733"\w*; of \w Meraioth|strong="H4812"\w*, \w Helkai|strong="H2517"\w*;
Of \w Iddo|strong="H5714"\w*, \w Zechariah|strong="H2148"\w*; of \w Ginnethon|strong="H1599"\w*, \w Meshullam|strong="H4918"\w*;
Of \w Abijah|strong="H0029"\w*, \w Zichri|strong="H2147"\w*; of \w Miniamin|strong="H4509"\w*, of \w Moadiah|strong="H4153"\w*, \w Piltai|strong="H6408"\w*;
Of \w Bilgah|strong="H1083"\w*, \w Shammua|strong="H8051"\w*; of \w Shemaiah|strong="H8098"\w*, \w Jehonathan|strong="H3083"\w*;
And of \w Joiarib|strong="H3114"\w*, \w Mattenai|strong="H4982"\w*; of \w Jedaiah|strong="H3048"\w*, \w Uzzi|strong="H5813"\w*;
Of \w Sallai|strong="H5543"\w*, \w Kallai|strong="H7040"\w*; of \w Amok|strong="H5987"\w*, \w Eber|strong="H5677"\w*;
Of \w Hilkiah|strong="H2518"\w*, \w Hashabiah|strong="H2811"\w*; of \w Jedaiah|strong="H3048"\w*, \w Nethaneel|strong="H5417"\w*.

¶ The \w Levites|strong="H3881"\w* in the \w days|strong="H3117"\w* of \w Eliashib|strong="H0475"\w*, \w Joiada|strong="H3111"\w*, and \w Johanan|strong="H3110"\w*, and \w Jaddua|strong="H3037"\w*, \add were\add* \w recorded|strong="H3789"\w* \w chief|strong="H7218"\w* of the \w fathers|strong="H0001"\w*: also the \w priests|strong="H3548"\w*, to the \w reign|strong="H4438"\w* of \w Darius|strong="H1867"\w* the \w Persian|strong="H6542"\w*.

The \w sons|strong="H1121"\w* of \w Levi|strong="H3878"\w*, the \w chief|strong="H7218"\w* of the \w fathers|strong="H0001"\w*, \add were\add* \w written|strong="H3789"\w* in the \w book|strong="H5612"\w* of the \w chronicles|strong="H1697"\w*, even until the \w days|strong="H3117"\w* of \w Johanan|strong="H3110"\w* the \w son|strong="H1121"\w* of \w Eliashib|strong="H0475"\w*.

And the \w chief|strong="H7218"\w* of the \w Levites|strong="H3881"\w*: \w Hashabiah|strong="H2811"\w*, \w Sherebiah|strong="H8274"\w*, and \w Jeshua|strong="H3442"\w* the \w son|strong="H1121"\w* of \w Kadmiel|strong="H6934"\w*, with their \w brethren|strong="H0251"\w* over against them, to \w praise|strong="H1984"\w* \add and\add* to give \w thanks|strong="H3034"\w*, according to the \w commandment|strong="H4687"\w* of \w David|strong="H1732"\w* the \w man|strong="H0376"\w* of \w God|strong="H0430"\w*, \w ward|strong="H4929"\w* over \w against|strong="H5980"\w* \w ward|strong="H4929"\w*.

\w Mattaniah|strong="H4983"\w*, and \w Bakbukiah|strong="H1229"\w*, \w Obadiah|strong="H5662"\w*, \w Meshullam|strong="H4918"\w*, \w Talmon|strong="H2929"\w*, \w Akkub|strong="H6126"\w*, \add were\add* \w porters|strong="H7778"\w* \w keeping|strong="H8104"\w* the \w ward|strong="H4929"\w* at the \w thresholds|strong="H0624"\w* of the \w gates|strong="H8179"\w*.\f + \fr 12.25 \ft thresholds: or, treasuries, or, assemblies\f*

These \add were\add* in the \w days|strong="H3117"\w* of \w Joiakim|strong="H3113"\w* the \w son|strong="H1121"\w* of \w Jeshua|strong="H3442"\w*, the \w son|strong="H1121"\w* of \w Jozadak|strong="H3136"\w*, and in the \w days|strong="H3117"\w* of \w Nehemiah|strong="H5166"\w* the \w governor|strong="H6346"\w*, and of \w Ezra|strong="H5830"\w* the \w priest|strong="H3548"\w*, the \w scribe|strong="H5608"\w*.

¶ And at the \w dedication|strong="H2598"\w* of the \w wall|strong="H2346"\w* of \w Jerusalem|strong="H3389"\w* they \w sought|strong="H1245"\w* the \w Levites|strong="H3881"\w* out of all their \w places|strong="H4725"\w*, to \w bring|strong="H0935"\w* them to \w Jerusalem|strong="H3389"\w*, to \w keep|strong="H6213"\w* the \w dedication|strong="H2598"\w* with \w gladness|strong="H8057"\w*, both with \w thanksgivings|strong="H8426"\w*, and with \w singing|strong="H7892"\w*, \add with\add* \w cymbals|strong="H4700"\w*, \w psalteries|strong="H5035"\w*, and with \w harps|strong="H3658"\w*.

And the \w sons|strong="H1121"\w* of the \w singers|strong="H7891"\w* gathered themselves \w together|strong="H0622"\w*, both out of the plain \w country|strong="H3603"\w* round \w about|strong="H5439"\w* \w Jerusalem|strong="H3389"\w*, and from the \w villages|strong="H2691"\w* of \w Netophathi|strong="H5200"\w*;

Also from the \w house|strong="H1004"\w* of \w Gilgal|strong="H1537"\w*, and out of the \w fields|strong="H7704"\w* of \w Geba|strong="H1387"\w* and \w Azmaveth|strong="H5820"\w*: for the \w singers|strong="H7891"\w* had \w builded|strong="H1129"\w* them \w villages|strong="H2691"\w* round \w about|strong="H5439"\w* \w Jerusalem|strong="H3389"\w*.

And the \w priests|strong="H3548"\w* and the \w Levites|strong="H3881"\w* \w purified|strong="H2891"\w* themselves, and \w purified|strong="H2891"\w* the \w people|strong="H5971"\w*, and the \w gates|strong="H8179"\w*, and the \w wall|strong="H2346"\w*.

Then I brought \w up|strong="H5927"\w* the \w princes|strong="H8269"\w* of \w Judah|strong="H3063"\w* upon the \w wall|strong="H2346"\w*, and \w appointed|strong="H5975"\w* \w two|strong="H8147"\w* \w great|strong="H1419"\w* \add companies of them that gave\add* \w thanks|strong="H8426"\w*, \add whereof one\add* \w went|strong="H8418"\w* on the right \w hand|strong="H3225"\w* upon the \w wall|strong="H2346"\w* toward the \w dung|strong="H0830"\w* \w gate|strong="H8179"\w*:
And \w after|strong="H0310"\w* them \w went|strong="H3212"\w* \w Hoshaiah|strong="H1955"\w*, and \w half|strong="H2677"\w* of the \w princes|strong="H8269"\w* of \w Judah|strong="H3063"\w*,
And \w Azariah|strong="H5838"\w*, \w Ezra|strong="H5830"\w*, and \w Meshullam|strong="H4918"\w*,
\w Judah|strong="H3063"\w*, and \w Benjamin|strong="H1144"\w*, and \w Shemaiah|strong="H8098"\w*, and \w Jeremiah|strong="H3414"\w*,

And \add certain\add* of the \w priests’|strong="H3548"\w* \w sons|strong="H1121"\w* with \w trumpets|strong="H2689"\w*; \add namely\add*, \w Zechariah|strong="H2148"\w* the \w son|strong="H1121"\w* of \w Jonathan|strong="H3129"\w*, the \w son|strong="H1121"\w* of \w Shemaiah|strong="H8098"\w*, the \w son|strong="H1121"\w* of \w Mattaniah|strong="H4983"\w*, the \w son|strong="H1121"\w* of \w Michaiah|strong="H4320"\w*, the \w son|strong="H1121"\w* of \w Zaccur|strong="H2139"\w*, the \w son|strong="H1121"\w* of \w Asaph|strong="H0623"\w*:

And his \w brethren|strong="H0251"\w*, \w Shemaiah|strong="H8098"\w*, and \w Azarael|strong="H5832"\w*, \w Milalai|strong="H4450"\w*, \w Gilalai|strong="H1562"\w*, \w Maai|strong="H4597"\w*, \w Nethaneel|strong="H5417"\w*, and \w Judah|strong="H3063"\w*, \w Hanani|strong="H2607"\w*, with the \w musical|strong="H7892"\w* \w instruments|strong="H3627"\w* of \w David|strong="H1732"\w* the \w man|strong="H0376"\w* of \w God|strong="H0430"\w*, and \w Ezra|strong="H5830"\w* the \w scribe|strong="H5608"\w* \w before|strong="H6440"\w* them.

And at the \w fountain|strong="H5869"\w* \w gate|strong="H8179"\w*, which was over against them, they went \w up|strong="H5927"\w* by the \w stairs|strong="H4609"\w* of the \w city|strong="H5892"\w* of \w David|strong="H1732"\w*, at the going \w up|strong="H4608"\w* of the \w wall|strong="H2346"\w*, above the \w house|strong="H1004"\w* of \w David|strong="H1732"\w*, even unto the \w water|strong="H4325"\w* \w gate|strong="H8179"\w* \w eastward|strong="H4217"\w*.

And the \w other|strong="H8145"\w* \add company of them that gave\add* \w thanks|strong="H8426"\w* \w went|strong="H1980"\w* over \w against|strong="H4136"\w* \add them\add*, and I \w after|strong="H0310"\w* them, and the \w half|strong="H2677"\w* of the \w people|strong="H5971"\w* upon the \w wall|strong="H2346"\w*, from beyond the \w tower|strong="H4026"\w* of the \w furnaces|strong="H8574"\w* even unto the \w broad|strong="H7342"\w* \w wall|strong="H2346"\w*;

And from above the \w gate|strong="H8179"\w* of \w Ephraim|strong="H0669"\w*, and above the \w old|strong="H3465"\w* \w gate|strong="H8179"\w*, and above the \w fish|strong="H1709"\w* \w gate|strong="H8179"\w*, and the \w tower|strong="H4026"\w* of \w Hananeel|strong="H2606"\w*, and the \w tower|strong="H4026"\w* of \w Meah|strong="H3968"\w*, even unto the \w sheep|strong="H6629"\w* \w gate|strong="H8179"\w*: and they stood \w still|strong="H5975"\w* in the \w prison|strong="H4307"\w* \w gate|strong="H8179"\w*.

So \w stood|strong="H5975"\w* the \w two|strong="H8147"\w* \add companies of them that gave\add* \w thanks|strong="H8426"\w* in the \w house|strong="H1004"\w* of \w God|strong="H0430"\w*, and I, and the \w half|strong="H2677"\w* of the \w rulers|strong="H5461"\w* with me:

And the \w priests|strong="H3548"\w*; \w Eliakim|strong="H0471"\w*, \w Maaseiah|strong="H4641"\w*, \w Miniamin|strong="H4509"\w*, \w Michaiah|strong="H4320"\w*, \w Elioenai|strong="H0454"\w*, \w Zechariah|strong="H2148"\w*, \add and\add* \w Hananiah|strong="H2608"\w*, with \w trumpets|strong="H2689"\w*;

And \w Maaseiah|strong="H4641"\w*, and \w Shemaiah|strong="H8098"\w*, and \w Eleazar|strong="H0499"\w*, and \w Uzzi|strong="H5813"\w*, and \w Jehohanan|strong="H3076"\w*, and \w Malchijah|strong="H4441"\w*, and \w Elam|strong="H5867"\w*, and \w Ezer|strong="H5829"\w*. And the \w singers|strong="H7891"\w* sang \w loud|strong="H8085"\w*, with \w Jezrahiah|strong="H3156"\w* \add their\add* \w overseer|strong="H6496"\w*.\f + \fr 12.42 \ft sang…: Heb. made their voice to be heard\f*

Also that \w day|strong="H3117"\w* they \w offered|strong="H2076"\w* \w great|strong="H1419"\w* \w sacrifices|strong="H2077"\w*, and \w rejoiced|strong="H8055"\w*: for \w God|strong="H0430"\w* had made them \w rejoice|strong="H8055"\w* with \w great|strong="H1419"\w* \w joy|strong="H8057"\w*: the \w wives|strong="H0802"\w* also and the \w children|strong="H3206"\w* \w rejoiced|strong="H8055"\w*: so that the \w joy|strong="H8057"\w* of \w Jerusalem|strong="H3389"\w* was \w heard|strong="H8085"\w* even afar \w off|strong="H7350"\w*.

¶ And at that \w time|strong="H3117"\w* were \w some|strong="H0582"\w* \w appointed|strong="H6485"\w* over the \w chambers|strong="H5393"\w* for the \w treasures|strong="H0214"\w*, for the \w offerings|strong="H8641"\w*, for the \w firstfruits|strong="H7225"\w*, and for the \w tithes|strong="H4643"\w*, to \w gather|strong="H3664"\w* into them out of the \w fields|strong="H7704"\w* of the \w cities|strong="H5892"\w* the \w portions|strong="H4521"\w* of the \w law|strong="H8451"\w* for the \w priests|strong="H3548"\w* and \w Levites|strong="H3881"\w*: for \w Judah|strong="H3063"\w* \w rejoiced|strong="H8057"\w* for the \w priests|strong="H3548"\w* and for the \w Levites|strong="H3881"\w* that \w waited|strong="H5975"\w*.\f + \fr 12.44 \ft of the law: that is, appointed by the law\f*\f + \fr 12.44 \ft for Judah…: Heb. for the joy of Judah\f*\f + \fr 12.44 \ft waited: Heb. stood\f*

And both the \w singers|strong="H7891"\w* and the \w porters|strong="H7778"\w* \w kept|strong="H8104"\w* the \w ward|strong="H4931"\w* of their \w God|strong="H0430"\w*, and the \w ward|strong="H4931"\w* of the \w purification|strong="H2893"\w*, according to the \w commandment|strong="H4687"\w* of \w David|strong="H1732"\w*, \add and\add* of \w Solomon|strong="H8010"\w* his \w son|strong="H1121"\w*.

For in the \w days|strong="H3117"\w* of \w David|strong="H1732"\w* and \w Asaph|strong="H0623"\w* of \w old|strong="H6924"\w* \add there were\add* \w chief|strong="H7218"\w* of the \w singers|strong="H7891"\w*, and \w songs|strong="H7892"\w* of \w praise|strong="H8416"\w* and \w thanksgiving|strong="H3034"\w* unto \w God|strong="H0430"\w*.

And all \w Israel|strong="H3478"\w* in the \w days|strong="H3117"\w* of \w Zerubbabel|strong="H2216"\w*, and in the \w days|strong="H3117"\w* of \w Nehemiah|strong="H5166"\w*, \w gave|strong="H5414"\w* the \w portions|strong="H4521"\w* of the \w singers|strong="H7891"\w* and the \w porters|strong="H7778"\w*, every \w day|strong="H3117"\w* his \w portion|strong="H1697"\w*: and they \w sanctified|strong="H6942"\w* \add holy things\add* unto the \w Levites|strong="H3881"\w*; and the \w Levites|strong="H3881"\w* \w sanctified|strong="H6942"\w* \add them\add* unto the \w children|strong="H1121"\w* of \w Aaron|strong="H0175"\w*.\f + \fr 12.47 \ft sanctified: that is, set apart\f*
